question: 一等
sourceMnemonic: When you're <kanji>equal</kanji> to <kanji>one</kanji> you are the very top. You are <vocabulary>first class</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>first rank</vocabulary>. In fact, you are <vocabulary>the best</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. <ja>いち</ja> gets shortened to <ja>いっ</ja> though, so watch out for that if you want to remain <vocabulary>the best</vocabulary>, yeah?
